item.title: InCTF 2020 ArchRide Writeup
item.description: This past month, I played InCTF, a mid-level CTF organized by India’s premier team, bi0s. I managed to solve one challenge called ArchRide - my first solve of a 1000-point challenge. The file given is a bzip that contains an ELF. Loading the ELF into Ghidra, we see a simple main function that reads a 14-character key and runs it through two check function. If the checks pass, the binary will print “Surprise!
